General.Name: Malindo Feedmill Tbk
General.Description: PT Malindo Feedmill Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the animal feed, chicken breeding and broiler farm, and food processing businesses in Indonesia. The company provides broiler, layer, and chicken breeding; and parent stock and day old chick final stock. It also produces fried chicken; eggs; and other products, as well as food processing facility under the SunnyGold, Sobat, and Ciki Wiki brands. In addition, it offers live animals, chicken meat and processed chicken meat, and pharmaceuticals; animal feed concentrates, poultry slaughterhouse and packaging; research and development of agricultural and animal husbandry. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Malindo Feedmill Tbk is a subsidiary of Dragon Amity Pte. Ltd.
General.Address: Komplek Golden Plaza, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12420
